mdRecord.dcterms:title: Hull House, exterior|general view
mdRecord.dcterms:creator: Wilson, Richard Guy [photographer]
mdRecord.dcterms:publisher: Rector and Visitors of the University of Virginia
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Facade with Chicago Circle Center in background

Original building of the settlement house complex co-founded in 1889 by Jane Addams and Ellen Gates Starr. The facility remained until it was purchased in 1963 by what was then called the University of Illinois-Circle Campus. Most buildings in the complex destroyed; original building restored 1967. Now the Jane Addams-Hull House Museum. -- https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Hull_House [work]
